name: tab-tosser
description: Automatically close tabs that have been ignored for too long. Free yourself of digital clutter.

scripts.build:cp: rm -rf dist/* && cp LICENSE.txt dist/ && cp src/{manifest.json,icon.svg} dist/ && mkdir dist/lib && cp src/lib/{background.html,first-run.html,support.html,options.html,styles.css} dist/lib/ && mkdir dist/vendor && cp src/vendor/* dist/vendor
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:cp && npm run build:ts

author: Jeremiah Lee
